message: Anyone know a really good tumblr client for Mac OSX with dashboard
MyTumblr, is the best, use it. http://myownapp.com/applications/mytumblr/index.html
@italiano40 No, but you can see your dashboard simplified or just the same as you see in the browser
@josheron do you know if it has scripting or plugin so I can see if my questions get answered on the dash?
@italiano40 yeah, I guess, but even the tumblr website don´t allow that, we have to wait then
@josheron I want something more powerful with the dash I miss so much and it sucks
has anyone tried opentumblr? https://github.com/jyr/opentumblr looks ok maybe try that LOL
@jyr i was just laughing at how basic it was and it took me to get my system up to be able to run it, and it was crap
